author: your.email@example.com
name: medresearch_agent
description: Medical research paper analyzer with multi-paper synthesis, evidence quality scoring, and citation-backed Q&A. Processes PDF research papers to extract key findings, compare studies, and identify consensus across medical literature.

auth.note: Can be enabled in production with DID authentication

storage.note: Stores paper cache and analysis results in memory. Can be upgraded to Redis or PostgreSQL for persistence.

scheduler.note: Can be upgraded to Redis for distributed scheduling

multi_paper_synthesis.description: Compare and synthesize findings across multiple papers

qa_with_citations.description: Answer questions about papers with proper citations

medical_disclaimer.text: This information is for educational and research purposes only. It is NOT medical advice and should NOT be used for diagnosis or treatment. Always consult qualified healthcare professionals for medical decisions.

rate_limiting.note: Can be enabled for production to prevent abuse
